sn22.21:1.2: Atha kho ayasma anando yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma anando bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn22.21:1.4: Katamesanam kho, bhante, dhammanam nirodho ‘nirodho’ti vuccati”ti?
sn22.21:1.5: “Rupam kho, ananda, aniccam sankhatam paticcasamuppannam khayadhammam vayadhammam viragadhammam nirodhadhammam.
sn22.21:1.7: Vedana anicca sankhata paticcasamuppanna khayadhamma vayadhamma viragadhamma nirodhadhamma.
sn22.21:1.10: sankhara anicca sankhata paticcasamuppanna khayadhamma vayadhamma viragadhamma nirodhadhamma.
sn22.21:1.12: Vinnanam aniccam sankhatam paticcasamuppannam khayadhammam vayadhammam viragadhammam nirodhadhammam.
sn22.21:1.14: Imesam kho, ananda, dhammanam nirodho ‘nirodho’ti vuccati”ti.
